metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12523 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Squid before 4.9. When handling a URN request, acorresponding HTTP request is made. This HTTP request doesn't go throughthe access checks that incoming HTTP requests go through. This causes allaccess checks to be bypassed and allows access to restricted HTTP servers,e.g., an attacker can connect to HTTP servers that only listen onlocalhost.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
